DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety Q Fever vaccine , NDBR 105 , collect data incidence occupational Q Fever infection risk personnel .
DOC.detailed_description: Study Objectives : 1 . Continue collect ass safety data Q Fever Vaccine , Phase I , Inactivated , Freeze-Dried , NDBR 105 , 2 ) Provide vaccine potentially protect personnel risk occupational exposure Q Fever collect data incidence occupational Q Fever infection ( subclinical clinical ) immunize personnel .
DOC.criteria: At least 18 year old , active military duty , 17 year old . Females childbearing potential must agree urine pregnancy test day receipt skin test antigen AND vaccine . ( Exception : documented hysterectomy > three year menopause . ) The result must negative . Volunteer must actively enrol SIP Volunteer must consider risk exposure C. burnetii . Volunteer must sign date approve ICD HIPAA Authorization . Volunteer must uptodate ( within one year ) medical history , physical examination , laboratory test chart medically clear participation Investigator . Examinations test may repeat within one year discretion enrol physician . Volunteer must willing return followup visit . Volunteer must agree report AEs may may associate administration test article least 28 day vaccination . All SAEs UAEs report duration volunteer 's participation study ( one year ) . Prior history Q fever disease vaccination . Clinically significant abnormal lab result include evidence Hepatitis C , Hepatitis B carrier state , elevate liver function test ( two time normal range discretion PI ) . Personal history immunodeficiency current treatment immunosuppressive medication autoimmune disease . Confirmed HIV infection . Heart valve disease : murmur abnormal echocardiogram ( murmur detect examination , volunteer refer cardiologist rule pathology . ) Positive pregnancy test lactate female ( female must agree become pregnant three month vaccination . ) Any known allergy component vaccine . Administration another inactivated vaccine within 7 day live IND vaccine within 28 day Q fever vaccination . Any unresolved AE result previous immunization .
DOC.keyword: Coxiella burnetti , Bacterial Infections , Rickettsia , Hepatits , Endocarditis
